original_text: After they had crossed the river, Elijah said to Elisha, ‘The Lord will soon take me away from you. What do you want me to do for you before that happens?’ Elisha replied, ‘Please let me have twice as much of your spirit.’
korean_text: 건너매 엘리야가 엘리사에게 이르되 나를 네게서 데려감을 당하기 전에 내가 네게 어떻게 할지를 구하라 엘리사가 이르되 당신의 성령이 하시는 역사가 갑절이나 내게 있게 하소서 하는지라

sentences.original_text: After they had crossed the river
The Lord will soon take me away from you
sentences.korean_translation: 주께서 곧 나를 너희에게서 데려가실 것이다

sentences.original_text: What do you want me to do for you
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너를 위해 무엇을 해주기를 원하느냐

sentences.original_text: Please let me have twice as much of your spirit
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 영을 두 배로 받게 해 주십시오
